abstract: Visa has tapped Charles W. Scharf, a former head of JPMorgan Chase’s vast retail arm, as its new chief executive, as Visa’s current leader prepares for retirement next year.
snippet: Visa has tapped Charles W. Scharf, a former head of JPMorgan Chase’s vast retail arm, as its new chief executive, as Visa’s current leader prepares for retirement next year.
lead_paragraph: Visa announced on Wednesday that it had named Charles W. Scharf, a former head of JPMorgan Chase‘s vast retail arm, as its new chief executive, as Visa’s current leader prepares for retirement next year.

headline.main: Visa Names JPMorgan’s Scharf as Its New Chief

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
